statements: SELECT * FROM game_settings;
SELECT player_id, sound_volume, music_volume FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE sound_volume > 50;
SELECT player_id, difficulty_level FROM game_settings ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(sound_volume), MAX(music_volume) FROM game_settings;
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT sound_volume, difficulty_level FROM game_settings WHERE music_volume > 50;
SELECT player_id, sound_volume, music_volume, difficulty_level FROM game_settings WHERE sound_volume BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM game_settings ORDER BY music_volume DESC, sound_volume ASC;
SELECT player_id, difficulty_level FROM game_settings WHERE sound_volume > 20 AND (music_volume < 30 OR difficulty_level = 'Hard') LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, theme, sound_volume, difficulty_level FROM game_settings;
SELECT sound_volume, theme, difficulty_level, player_id FROM game_settings;
SELECT display_name, timezone, language FROM player_preferences;
SELECT display_name, language, timezone FROM player_preferences;
SELECT theme, player_id, sound_volume, difficulty_level FROM game_settings;
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, theme, difficulty_level FROM game_settings ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT display_name, language FROM player_preferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT player_id, theme, sound_volume FROM game_settings WHERE sound_volume > 50 ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, theme, display_name, language, timezone FROM game_settings JOIN player_preferences ON game_settings.player_id = player_preferences.player_id;
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, volume FROM game_settings WHERE difficulty = 2;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT player_id, controls FROM player_preferences WHERE theme = 'light';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_id, volume FROM game_settings WHERE difficulty > 5 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT preference_id, theme, controls FROM player_preferences WHERE theme LIKE '%dark%' ORDER BY preference_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, volume, difficulty, theme FROM game_settings JOIN player_preferences ON game_settings.player_id = player_preferences.player_id WHERE difficulty BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 10;
SELECT * FROM game_settings;
SELECT player_id, graphics_quality FROM game_settings WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM player_preferences WHERE notification_settings = true;
SELECT level_name, difficulty_level, score_requirement FROM levels WHERE score_requirement > 100;
SELECT player_id, graphics_quality, sound_volume, controls_config FROM game_settings;
SELECT language_preference, theme_preference FROM player_preferences WHERE notification_settings = TRUE;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM levels WHERE score_requirement > 100 ORDER BY difficulty_level DESC;
SELECT player_id, language_preference, theme_preference, notification_settings FROM player_preferences WHERE language_preference = 'English';
SELECT * FROM PlayerPreferences;
SELECT player_id, volume_level FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE player_id = '1234-5678-9012';
SELECT graphics_id, resolution FROM GraphicsSettings WHERE graphics_quality = 'High';
SELECT control_id, sensitivity FROM ControlSettings ORDER BY sensitivity DESC;
SELECT customization_id, theme, character_skin FROM CustomizationSettings WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT player_id, volume_level, music_enabled FROM PlayerPreferences WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT game_id, difficulty_level FROM GameSettings WHERE difficulty_level = 'Hard' ORDER BY game_id DESC;
SELECT graphics_id, resolution, graphics_quality FROM GraphicsSettings WHERE resolution LIKE '%1080p%';
SELECT control_id, sensitivity, invert_y_axis FROM ControlSettings WHERE sensitivity > 0.5;
SELECT customization_id, theme, character_skin FROM CustomizationSettings WHERE theme = 'dark' AND character_skin = 'ninja';
